column3:
One night I was at my friend's house where he threw a party. We were enjoying our dinner
ewlineat night when all of a sudden we heard a knock on the door. I opened the door and saw this
ewlineguy who had scar on his face. I asked my friend "who is that guy?", and he told me that it
ewlinewas his friend. I didn't trust that guy because he looked very strange.
ewline
ewlineAfter we had dinner the strange guy asked my friend to come outside because he wanted to
ewlinetalk to him. A few seconds later I heard a noise from outside and when I ran outside I saw
ewlinethat the strange guy was trying to beat my friend. I ran towards him and asked him to
ewlineleave our house. He left the house but after half an hour he came back and this time he
ewlinewas dressed up as superhero and he also had a sword. As soon as I saw him I ran inside the
ewlinehouse and called the cops. The cops came and the guy ran away as soon as he heard the cop
ewlinecar coming. We never found out what happened to that guy after that day.
column4: one: What was the strange guy doing with the friend?
column9: one: Why did the strange guy run away?
column10: because he heard the cop car
column12: because he didn't like the dinner
column14: one: Who was the strange guy dressed up as?
column19: one: What did they eat at the friend's house?
